meanings.definition: The provision of fresh air to a room or building.
meanings.sent1: Proper ventilation is important for maintaining good indoor air quality.
meanings.sent2: The ventilation in this room is excellent, thanks to the large windows.
meanings.sent3: I tried to improve the ventilation in my house by opening all the windows at once.
meanings.sent4: The ventilation system in the office is like a gentle breeze, keeping us comfortable all day.
meanings.sent5: Fresh ventilation can make a stuffy room feel much more pleasant.

meanings.sent1: During exercise, increased ventilation helps cool down the body.
meanings.sent2: The ventilation of the fan helped to spread the cool air throughout the room.
meanings.sent3: The ventilation of the windmill was so strong that it blew my hat off!
meanings.sent4: The ventilation of ideas in the meeting room led to a creative solution to the problem.
meanings.sent5: The ventilation of the storm brought a refreshing change to the hot summer day.
